https://openminds.om-i.org/props/dataLoc.name: dataLocation

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/dimensi._instruction: Enter the dimension of this volume.

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/dimensi.name: dimension

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/numberO.name: numberOfSlices

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/numberO._instruction: Enter the total number of volumes in this volume sequence (at least two).

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/tempora.name: temporalResolution
